resources.string: %s is too large, please insert smaller number
There is an account with this email
Error: 400 Bad request. Please report this.
200 OK, everything seems ok. Please tell me if you ever see this.
201 Created, everything seems ok. Please tell me if you ever see this.
Error: 404 Not found. Please report this.
Error: 500 Server error. Please report this.
Something has gone really wrong. You shouldn\'t see this, but if you do, please tell me.
Username or password don\'t match. Please check, then try again
You aren\'t trying to do something you know you can\'t, are you? If you don\'t know what\'s going on, please report this.
Server is reporting an unknown error. Please report this.
Server says it can\'t find what I am looking for, which is weird. Please report this.
Server complains about a duplicate. If you don\'t know what\'s going on, please report this.
Server says it can\'t understand me, which is weird. Please report this.
Server is drunk (or I messed up something badly). Please report this.
That means you won\'t see any new changes, though you can still browse any data you have already seen
This means you won\'t be able to add new stuff or refresh until you reconnect
Something is wrong with the network, or the server is unavailable. Please report this.
I\'m having some troubles with files… Please report this.
Something is wrong with the files or the network. Please report this.
You cannot make any changes while you\'re offline (for now).
Something has gone very wrong. Please report this.
You can\'t view member list while you\'re offline. Please connect to the internet and try again.
To register a new account, you need to be online. Please connect to the internet and try again.
Something is wrong with the network. You will be logged in as an offline user. Please report this.
And I don\'t know what. You\'ll be logged in as an offline user. Please report this.
The password you entered is incorrect.
Search is unavailable while you\'re offline. Please connect to the internet and try again.
Only members can add new items and see exams and audio recordings
Are you sure you want to remove these notes?
If you remove them, they are gone forever; no one will be able to see them anymore (you can use the hide button to remove them only for you)
Are you sure you want to remove these questions?
If you remove them, they are gone forever; no one will be able to see them anymore (you can use the hide button to remove them only for you)
Are you sure you want to remove this lesson?
If you remove it, all its data is gone forever, including all notes and questions; no one will be able to see it anymore (you can swipe it away to hide it only for you)
Are you sure you want to remove this course?
If you remove it, all its data is gone forever, including all lessons, notes and questions; no one will be able to see it anymore (you can swipe it away to hide it only for you)
This will remove user from the group. Are you sure you want to proceed?
After you leave the group, you won\'t be able to add new items or view exam notes and questions
You can\'t remove course from here
Removing courses from here isn\'t supported yet, but I\'m glad you tried!
Your password has been successfully changed!
Your request has been sent. You\'ll be a group member as soon as one of mods accepts your request.
You can\'t view recent edits while you\'re offline. Please connect to the internet and try again.
This isn\'t a valid email address
Enter your friend\'s email address. If he/she isn\'t using %1$s already, they will be sent an invitation to sign up for the app, along with the group invitation.
By registering for an account, I agree to the EULA and Privacy Policy

Private items are visible only to the members of the group. All items inside categories marked as private are going to be private as well. If first note or question created in lesson is private, whole lesson is made private.

All Unicode characters represent valid input (yes, emojis too). However, in order to simplify typing, there are some shortcuts for frequently used characters: a caret (^) puts a letter, digit or mathematical symbol (+,-,=,(,)) in superscript, an underscore (_) before a digit puts it in subscript, and a backslash (\\) transforms a Latin letter into the appropriate Greek equivalent. If you want to type those symbols normally, double them (i.e. \\\\ becomes \\). The Latin-to-Greek conversion table is as follows:
Sorry, selecting audio from (some) SD cards isn\'t supported yet :(

There are multiple permission levels, which you can change from here:
Not a member - means the user either requested access to the group, or was invited by a regular member. This group appears in his app, but he can't see private items or contribute new content. You can accept the request by ticking the "Mem" box (last one)
Regular member - can view private items, add new things and edit notes, questions and exams
Mod - can accept join requests, edit courses and delete items permanently
Owner - is able to create announcements, edit group details, kick out or demote mods and users, as well as promote new ones. There's a special "owner" permission not displayed here, creator, which is assigned only to the person who created the group with only difference being that (s)he can't be kicked out.
Your invitation hasn\'t been approved yet
You have been invited to join this group, but your invitation hasn\'t been approved by a group mod yet. When it gets approved, you will become a member of this group.
You cannot view group announcements while you\'re offline. Please reconnect and try again.
Server is down for maintenance. Please try again later.
Server is unreachable. If issue persists, please report it.
Server is down for planned maintenance. Please try again later.
Server is unreachable at the moment. If the problem persists, please report it.
Use the \"Join group\" option from the left panel to search for your school or faculty, or if it isn\'t present tap the \"Create group\" to add it
Tap on the header to see your profile
Enter your institution name and place to distinguish it from the others, and add an image
Check this box to disallow join requests (you will have to invite the others)
Inside courses you can find all the useful materials, or add your own.
Swipe course left or right to hide it if you\'re not interested, and re-show it later using \"Show all\" option from the options menu. Swipe up the screen to refresh.
Use the filter icon from the top of the screen to display only years you\'re interested in
Use the pencil button to request access to this group
All items are categorized by lessons. If the lesson with the specified name doesn\'t already exist, it is automatically created, and this item is placed inside it
Also check out the special shortcuts you can use in both lesson names and item content by tapping the rightmost icon!
Tap a note to show its contents, swipe it right to hide it, hold and drag up or down to reorder, or hold to access additional options
Pick a course this exam should refer to

Everything this exam encompasses, can be different from course lessons (e.g. comma-separated list). Combined with other properties, it will be a part of unique name for a private lesson which will be created in the selected course.
A way to differentiate it from the other students of the same year who are taking the same exam, e.g. 2-1, 2-A or 2014-E
Type of the examination, could be anything e.g. oral or written test
Date this exam is planned for (can be changed later). Exams (but not the associated lessons!) will be deleted from schedule two days after they have been held.
Server says you don\'t have the permission to do that
Seems like you have reached the invitation limit. Try again in few days, and meanwhile you can instruct your friends how to install the app and join your group (sorry \'bout that)
Something has gone wrong while sending your invite, sorry! (Meanwhile, you can always instruct your friends how to install the app and join your group)
…and I\'m not sure what. If you could pass me this: \"%s\" I\'d be grateful
…or to be exact, %1$d (out of %2$d). The rest failed to send for unknown reason. You can still tell your friends how to install and join your group, to make sure (also, check the members screen).
Seems like you are making too many requests to server. Try again in a minute.
Error: 502 Bad Gateway (server error). Got this, will be fixed soon.
It seems that you\'re making too many requests to server. Try again in a minute
That\'s a server error, sorry. It will be fixed soon.
202, Accepted, everything seems ok (at least partially). Please tell me if you see this.
Password is too short. Please use at least %1$d characters
Password is too long. Please use at most %d characters.
Username is too long. Please use at most %d characters.
Seems like things are slow or overloaded at my end, sorry about that. Please try again later.
413 Entity Too Large: seems like you\'re uploading too big file
It seems that you\'re trying to send too large file. Try something smaller.
